TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ciwidiyan, title = Ciwidiyan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciwidiyan} }

S.FORM: Ciwidiyan Itiniay i Shoufeng Cen no Hualien ko Ciwidiyan a niyaro', 379 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 864 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 61% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 526 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 39% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 338 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 53%, Truku 2%, Sakidaya 3%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Ciwidiyan Itiniay i Shoofeng Cen no Hoalien ko Ciwidiyan a niyaro', 379 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 864 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 61% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 526 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 39% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 338 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 53%, Troko 2%, Sakidaya 3%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
